description: A request to the JetStream $JS.API.CONSUMER.MSG.NEXT API
title: io.nats.jetstream.api.v1.consumer_getnext_request

expires.description: A duration from now when the pull should expire, stated in nanoseconds, 0 for no expiry

batch.description: How many messages the server should deliver to the requester

max_bytes.description: Sends at most this many bytes to the requester, limited by consumer configuration max_bytes

no_wait.description: When true a response with a 404 status header will be returned when no messages are available

idle_heartbeat.description: When not 0 idle heartbeats will be sent on this interval
